title: Land of the Lost Comics
additional-note: The Grand Comics Database notes that this comic is based on the Mutual Networks radio show 'Land of the Lost'.  (It aired from 1943 to 1948.)  There was also a related 'Land of the Lost' book published in 1945.  We have not checked to see whether there are any renewed copyrights for these earlier media that might affect the copyright status of this serial or its contents.
